 11#ifndef VSIP_CORE_EXPR_SCALAR_BLOCK_HPP
 12#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_SCALAR_BLOCK_HPP

 14#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 15#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 16#include <vsip/core/noncopyable.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/core/length.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/map_fwd.hpp>

 20namespace vsip
 21{
 22namespace impl
 23{
 24template <dimension_type D>
 25struct Scalar_block_shared_map
 26{
 27  // typedef Local_or_global_map<D> type;
 28  typedef Scalar_block_map<D> type;
 29  static type map;
 30};
 31
 32// These are explicitly instantiated in scalar_block.cpp
 33#if defined (__ghs__)
 34#pragma do_not_instantiate Scalar_block_shared_map<1>::map
 35#pragma do_not_instantiate Scalar_block_shared_map<2>::map
 36#pragma do_not_instantiate Scalar_block_shared_map<3>::map
 37#endif
 38
 39
 40/// An adapter presenting a scalar as a block. This is useful when constructing
 41/// binary expression blocks (which expect two block operands) taking a block and
 42/// a scalar.
 43///
 44/// Template parameters:
 45///   :D: to be a dimension with range 0 < D <= VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION
 46///   :Scalar: to be a builtin scalar type.
 47template <dimension_type D, typename Scalar>
 48class Scalar_block_base : public Non_assignable
 49{
 50public:
 51  typedef Scalar value_type;
 52  typedef value_type& reference_type;
 53  typedef value_type const& const_reference_type;
 54  typedef typename Scalar_block_shared_map<D>::type map_type;
 55
 56  static dimension_type const dim = D;
 57
 58  Scalar_block_base(Scalar s) : value_(s) {}
 59#if (defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ < 4)
 60  // GCC 3.4.4 appears to over-optimize multiple scalar values on
 61  // stack when optimization & strong inlining are enabled, causing
 62  // threshold.cpp and other tests to fail.  (070618)
 63  Scalar_block_base(Scalar_block_base const& b) : value_(b.value_) {}
 64#endif
 65
 66  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 67  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 68  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 69  { return Scalar_block_shared_map<D>::map; }
 70
 71  Scalar value() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return value_;}
 72
 73private:
 74  Scalar const         value_;
 75};
 76
 77} // namespace vsip::impl
 78} // namespace vsip
 79
 80namespace vsip_csl
 81{
 82namespace expr
 83{
 84
 85template <dimension_type D, typename T>
 86class Scalar;
 87
 88/// Scalar specialization for 1-dimension.
 89template <typename T>
 90class Scalar<1, T> : public impl::Scalar_block_base<1, T>
 91{
 92public:
 93  Scalar(T s) : impl::Scalar_block_base<1, T>(s) {}
 94  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 0;}
 95  length_type size(dimension_type, dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 0;}
 96  T get(index_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return this->value();}
 97};
 98
 99/// Scalar specialization for 2-dimension.
100template <typename T>
101class Scalar<2, T> : public impl::Scalar_block_base<2, T>
102{
103public:
104  Scalar(T s) : impl::Scalar_block_base<2, T>(s) {}
105  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 0;}
106  length_type size(dimension_type, dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 0;}
107
108  T get(index_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return this->value();}
109  T get(index_type, index_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return this->value();}
110};
111
112/// Scalar specialization for 3-dimension.
113template <typename T>
114class Scalar<3, T> : public impl::Scalar_block_base<3, T>
115{
116public:
117  Scalar(T s) : impl::Scalar_block_base<3, T>(s) {}
118
119  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 0;}
120  length_type size(dimension_type, dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 0;}
121  T get(index_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return this->value();}
122  T get(index_type, index_type, index_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return this->value();}
123};
124
125} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
126} // namespace vsip_csl
127
128namespace vsip
129{
130namespace impl
131{
132namespace expr = vsip_csl::expr;
133template <dimension_type D, typename T>
134struct Is_expr_block<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
135{ static bool const value = true;};
136
137template <dimension_type D, typename T>
138struct Is_sized_block<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
139{ static bool const value = false;};
140
141template <dimension_type D, typename T>
142struct Is_scalar_block<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
143{ static bool const value = true;};
144
145template <dimension_type D, typename T>
146struct Distributed_local_block<expr::Scalar<D, T> const>
147{
148  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> const type;
149  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> const proxy_type;
150};
151
152template <dimension_type D, typename T>
153struct Distributed_local_block<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
154{
155  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> type;
156  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> proxy_type;
157};
158
159template <dimension_type D, typename T>
160expr::Scalar<D, T>
161get_local_block(expr::Scalar<D, T> const &block) { return block;}
162
163template <typename CombineT, dimension_type D, typename T>
164struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Scalar<D, T> const>
165{
166  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> block_type;
167  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
168  type;
169  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
170  tree_type;
171};
172
173template <typename CombineT, dimension_type D, typename T>
174struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Scalar<D, T> >
175  : Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Scalar<D, T> const>
176{};
177
178template <typename CombineT, dimension_type D, typename T>
179typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
180			     expr::Scalar<D, T> const>::type
181apply_combine(CombineT const &combine, expr::Scalar<D, T> const &block)
182{
183  return combine.apply(block);
184}
185
186template <typename VisitorT, dimension_type D, typename T>
187void
188apply_leaf(VisitorT const &visitor, expr::Scalar<D, T> const &block)
189{
190  visitor.apply(block);
191}
192
193template <dimension_type MapDim,
194	  typename       MapT,
195	  dimension_type D,
196	  typename T>
197struct Is_par_same_map<MapDim, MapT, expr::Scalar<D, T> >
198{
199  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> block_type;
200
201  static bool value(MapT const&, block_type const&)
202  {
203    return true;
204  }
205};

208// Default Is_par_reorg_ok is OK.

211
212/// Assert that subblock is local to block (overload).
213template <dimension_type D, typename T>
214void
215assert_local(expr::Scalar<D, T> const &block, index_type sb)
216{
217  // Scalar_block is always valid locally.
218}
219
220template <dimension_type D, typename T>
221struct Choose_peb<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
222{ typedef Peb_reuse_tag type; };
223
224/// Store Scalar_blocks by-value.
225template <dimension_type D, typename T>
226struct View_block_storage<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
227  : By_value_block_storage<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
228{};
229
230template <dimension_type D, typename T>
231struct Expr_block_storage<expr::Scalar<D, T> >
232{
233  typedef expr::Scalar<D, T> type;
234};
